title: FS: Low Grade T206 Tinker, Evers, and Chance  **ALL SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T206 Tinker, Evers, and Chance  **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are low grade cards as the scans will show, but have nice eye appeal on the front image for the technical grade. 

I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured:

Chance (yellow portrait) - **SOLD**
Evers (batting, Chicago on jersey) - **SOLD**
Tinker (hands on knees) - **SOLD**
I will take Evers and Tinker
